text: Robert John Sunell (5 June 1929 â€“ 8 August 2020) was a major general in the United States Army. He was Program Manager of Tank Systems for the United States Army Tank-Automotive Command. Sunell was born in Astoria, Oregon. He served on the U.S. Army between 1953 to 1988. Sunell died on 8 August 2020 at the age of 91.Robert John Sunell ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American generals Category:Military people from Oregon
title: Robert J. Sunell
